column2: Covered in heavy barding and spikes, to tear the flesh of their foes.
Harkon's personal mount is a dreadful thing indeed - a Terrorgheist with a piercing, banshee-like shriek that has the power to stun any who hear it.
Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.
Arkhan’s winged chariot moves with supernatural speed as he scours the world in search of the enchanted items that will hasten the Great Necromancer’s return.
The Dread Abyssal ridden by Arkhan the Black was known to myth as Razark, the Doom of Traitors.
The dread abyssal ridden by Mannfred von Carstein was known to myth as Ashigaroth.
The dread abyssal ridden by Neferata was known to myth as Nagadron.
Covered in heavy barding and spikes, to tear the flesh of their foes.
